days.text: Dry. Fine apart from cloudy periods. Force 3 to 4 northerly winds, occasionally force 5 with gusts.
Dry. Fine apart from cloudy periods. Force 3 to 4 north to northeasterly winds.
Dry. Fine apart from cloudy periods. Force 2 to 4 northeasterly winds.
Fine. Force 2 to 4 east to northeasterly winds.
Temperature falling slightly. Fine apart from cloudy periods. Force 3 northerly winds, becoming force 4 to 5 with gusts.
